answers.answer: I have always been running a week behind. So at 32w, I measured 31.
I'm 2 weeks ahead. I measured at 32 when i was 30 weeks along but it could be due to my gestational diabetes.

My doctor says as long as you are within 3 weeks on either side it is within the normal range and you are fine. Anything more than 3 then they send you for a growth scan.  I'm sure your scan will come back totally fine, try not to worry!!!  I am 32 weeks, I have been measuring 2-3 weeks ahead.  It doesn't worry me at this point.

I am a bit confused with my measurements...Based on what I think my last cycle was my doctor gave me due date of 10-17-15 which puts me at 35 weeks tomo, but based on ultrasound done at 7 weeks I was given a due date of 10-23-15 which puts me at 34 weeks and she always tells me I am measuring exactly at my weeks but I get so excited to hear everything is going good that i forget to ask which one she is going off by!?

question: hi ladies , what was your bump measureing at 32 weeks? I'm measuring 29 so got to go for a growth scan. FTM Little bit worried x
title: Growth scan
